Reviews.Title: E71: "camera feature not suported". Battery drained
Reviews.Author: Andre
Reviews.Content: I bought as used/refurbished. Camera was not working at all with E71: "camera feature not suported". Battery drained in less than a day, instead of manufacturers promised 3..4 days standby time, even after buing a fresh battery. Phone heated up more than what I have seen from many other E71's before. I was not planning to use camera that much, but battery drain was the really BIG issue. The phone I got became a $180 paperweight. I was surprised to get something that was this much below, compared to the exceptionally good E71's I have seen before, circa 2009.

Reviews.Title: Nokia E71
Reviews.Author: saba
Reviews.Content: I can't See new Items!, Only used.... why ?looks like a it's good phone, but the price was listed different from now!I did add one of this product to my wishing list..., but no more new items that I can see now!.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile.Not all carrier features may be supported.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and US 3G compatibility via 850/1900 UMTS/HSDPA plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Access to corporate communication via Microsoft Exchange; full QWERTY keyboard; 3.2-megapixel camera/camcorder; stereo Bluetooth;
Up to 10.5 hours of GSM talk time, up to 400+ hours (17 days) of standby time
In the Box: battery, charger, connectivity cable, headset, Eseries lanyard, Eseries pouch, user guide, quick start guide and other documentation
GPS with Nokia Maps; Wi-Fi connectivity (802.11b/g); MicroSD expansion
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia E71 Unlocked Phone with 3.2 MP Digital Camera and 2nd camera, 3G, Media Player, GPS, 802.11g WiFi, Bluetooth, and FM radio
